verse: तावानस्य महिमा ततो ज्यायाश्च पूरुषः। पादोऽस्य सर्वा भूतानि त्रिपादस्यामृतं दिवीति॥
meaning: Meaning: The glory of that supreme being is great, and thereafter even greater is the person (being). All beings are his foot, and he is immortal as he exists beyond the three realms (heaven, earth, and the underworld).
